short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display small shariah indicator to stock list in Tradingview(IDX)
short.ms: Paparkan penunjuk syariah kecil ke senarai saham dalam Tradingview(IDX)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stock information from trading view by default does not have any flag that indicate the stock is allow for trading since muslim is forbidden to buy/sell non shariah stock. This application provide additional icon in trading view, so user can see filter out any stock that not shariah compliance. Instead of check and in their excel or pdf that release by Indonesia Stock Exchange. Hence, the decision to buy the stock is much faster and user not losing the moment of buy.
